content.rendered:
The Scorepesa gaming platform was launched in 2019 and is licensed by the Betting Control & Licensing Board of Kenya. A product of BETWIN LIMITED, this new sports gaming platform enters the market at a time when international sports and especially football has such a huge following gin Kenya. Those who wish to gamble within this platform must at least 18 years of age. Judging from the warning messages on the gaming site, Scorepesa is clearly committed to responsible gambling.

Creating an account on Scorepesa

Do you have a mobile phone number? That is basically all you need to register an account on this gaming site. If you prefer SMS registration, send a text message with the word GAME to 29008. The system will respond by send back a set of prompts which must be answered to complete the process. If you prefer using the web platform for registration, launch www.scorepesa.co.ke on your browser them click on ‘Register Now’ link.

At the moment, all deposits and withdrawals on Scorepesa are processed via MPESA so it is best to register with a Safaricom number to avoid any inconveniences.

Bonuses and rewards

Having joined the gambling scene when there are quite a number of players already settled in, it is such an innovative idea for Scorepesa to have a welcome bonus. To get this bonus of 1,000/=, a player is required to create an account first then deposit a minimum of 50/=. The only condition to this bonus that account holders must understand is that it is only to be redeemed in bits and is not to be withdrawn or used as a bet. Regardless of the bet amount and provided your bet has an odds minimum of 5; Scorepesa will refund 10% of the stake. This bonus refund is credited back into your account after a bet has been placed successfully so it can be withdrawn of used in subsequent bets.

In short:  for your bet with 1000/=, you get back 100/= and your bonus balance is 900/=.

Games

Soccer betting is quite an attraction for sport gamblers and Scorepesa has capitalized on facilitating this. By having matches from most of the major leagues in the world, players can bet on games from different corners of the globe. Including games from various locations ensures that players always have matches to pick from throughout the day and night. In addition to soccer, the site also hosts match fixture for other games such as Ice Hockey, Tennis, Baseball, Rugby and American Football.

Get more information about The most Stunning Jackpots in Kenya.

Live betting

Did you forget to bet on your favorite match before it began? Or perhaps you wanted to see the first few minutes of play before you made your decision on possible outcomes. Scorepesa accommodates in-game betting for some games featured on the site.

Deposits and withdrawals

Currently, Scorepesa only supports deposits and withdrawals through MPESA (Safaricom).

  • On your MPESA menu, open the “Lipan a MPESA” item on the list.
  • Choose the “Pay Bill” option
  • Key in 290080 when prompted to enter the business number
  • Click “OK”
  • Key in SCOREPESA when prompted for the account number
  • Click “OK”
  • Key in numerals the value of your intended top-up
  • Click “OK”
  • Type in your MPESA pin
  • Click “OK” to confirm your transaction

You will receive an MPESA message confirming that your Scorepesa account has been credited.

To find out how much money is in your Scorepesa account, SMS “balance” to 29008. This amount is always displayed on your individual player account on the right hand top corner of the portal.

Withdrawing funds from an account on Scorepesa can be in either one of two ways. Either by sending a text message with W#AMOUNT to 29008 or clicking on the withdrawal link in the website when logged in.

Placing a bet

Scorepesa has provided multiple channels for its players through which to bet. These are SMS, WEB, USSD and Scorepesa App. With a mobile phone in your hand, it is easy to place a bet on Scorepesa. To place a bet via SMS, you need to know the match ID for the games you want to bet on as well as the SMS betting format. To get a hold of this information text the word “FOOTBALL” to 29008. This is a subscription request and enables you to receive upcoming games via text message. The upcoming games SMS includes an example of a draft bet which is ID#PICK#AMOUNT.

Most people will find the website and App betting options to be more straightforward. The games on these channels can be sorted in order of playtime, country or league. To place a bet, the player needs to click on the specific match to display various odd types they can choose from. If you are interested in either team to win or a draw, just click on that option from the match list and proceed. A bet slip can have as many games as you want but the possible winnings for any given selection cannot exceed 50,000/=.

Insights About Goliath Jackpot in Betlion.

Jackpots

It is possible to win a 1,000,000/= on Scorepesa on a daily basis courtesy of the Wekelea Jackpot. To get a list of the games listed on the jackpot slip, click on the Jackpot tab on the home page.

Customer support

At some point during the process of betting, creating an account, or withdrawing funds, players get stranded. This is where customer support comes in. At Scorepesa, the needs of the players are taken seriously. Every time you launch the website, you will notice a ‘We Are Here’ banner at the bottom right of your screen flagged by a waving hand and a red conversation notification. This is the live chat function which is available every time of every day of the week. If you feel that your query is urgent or you need an instant response, this is the right platform to use.

Scorepesa also provides an email address, phone support number and even whatsapp number. Whatever your query or unique circumstance is, help is always available on this gaming site.

Conclusion

Some of the functions on Scorepesa are yet to be activated, but from the look of things the site is here to stay. The clever bonus plan will definitely pull in a crowd of subscribers as the high odds keep them hooked.

excerpt.rendered: The Scorepesa gaming platform was launched in 2019 and is licensed by the Betting Control & Licensing Board of Kenya.
